original_text: As for the additional length of the tent curtains, the half curtain that is left over is to hang down at the rear of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 그 막 곧 휘장의 그 나머지 반 폭은 성막 뒤에 늘어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: As for the additional length of the tent curtains
the half curtain that is left over
is to hang down at the rear of the tabernacle
